name: Kirby: Squeak Squad
description:
Kirby: Squeak Squad is an arcade game developed by HAL Laboratory and Flagship. It was originally released in 2006. It was published by Nintendo. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Kirby: Squeak Squad on Nintendo DS.
It was produced by Kensuke Tanabe, Masayoshi Tanimura and Yasushi Adachi. It was directed by Takashi Hamamura. Hirokazu Ando, Jun Ishikawa, Shogo Sakai and Tadashi Ikegami scored the game.
